HediffDef.label: toxic metabolism
HediffDef.description: This creature's body converts toxic buildup into healing energy.

HediffDef.label: radiation sickness
HediffDef.description: Prolonged exposure to toxic radiation is slowly transforming this person into a ghoul. Their body is breaking down and changing at a cellular level. If the toxic buildup persists, the transformation will be complete.

HediffDef.label: glowing one
HediffDef.description: This ghoul's body emits an eerie radioactive glow. They slowly emit toxic radiation that harms nearby non-ghouls.
